name: Pizza Pop Mario
overview:
Pizza Pop Mario, also known as Mary Pizza Pop, is a hack of Pizza Pop for the Famicom which replaces the pizza delivery guy, "Kid-kun", with Mario. The game starts with 10 lives instead of 3, and the time limit for every stage is now nine minutes. The graphics are taken from Super Mario Bros. 3.

Mario has decided to start delivering pizzas to make some spare cash, in order to buy Princess Peach a nice gift! Toad, being very jealous, since Mario hasn't been spending much time with him, decides to try and sabotage Mario's plans. Will Mario succeed in getting Peach the gift, or will Toad be able to thwart Mario's plan?
